writing.instruction: Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
writing.prompt: The bar chart below shows the number of visitors to three museums in London between 2010 and 2015.

writing.instruction: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
writing.prompt: Some people think that the internet has brought people closer together, while others think that people are more isolated. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
